00001 #ifndef LINK_H
00002 #define LINK_H
00003 
00004 #include <GeneralDefinitions.h>
00005 
00006 //Abstract class for a node in a linked list (not to confuse with GenericNode, which is the same, just templated)
00007 class LinkClass
00008 {
00009 public:
00010         //Destructor
00011         virtual ~LinkClass()
00012                 JMP_THIS(0x5565A0);
00013 
00014         //LinkClass
00015         virtual LinkClass* GetNext()
00016                 { return Next; }
00017 
00018         virtual LinkClass* GetPrevious()
00019                 { return Previous; }
00020 
00021         virtual LinkClass* AddBeforeMe(LinkClass* pLink)        //adds pLink to the list, one node before this
00022                                                                                                                 //returns first node of the list
00023                 {
00024                         IsolateFromList();
00025                         
00026                         Next = pLink->Next;
00027                         Previous = pLink;
00028                         
00029                         pLink->set_Next(this);
00030                         
00031                         if(Next)
00032                                 Next->set_Previous(this);
00033                         
00034                         return GetFirst();
00035                 }
00036 
00037         virtual LinkClass* PutAtEndOf(LinkClass* pLink) //puts this at the end of the list pLink is in
00038                                                                                                         //returns first node of that list
00039                 {
00040                         IsolateFromList();
00041                         
00042                         LinkClass* pLast = pLink->GetLast();
00043 
00044                         pLast->set_Next(this);
00045                         Previous = pLast;
00046                         Next = NULL;
00047 
00048                         return GetFirst();
00049                 }
00050 
00051         virtual LinkClass* PutAtBeginningOf(LinkClass* pLink)   //puts this at the beginning of the list pLink is in
00052                                                                                                                 //returns first node of that list (this)
00053                 {
00054                         IsolateFromList();
00055                         
00056                         LinkClass* pFirst = pLink->GetFirst();
00057 
00058                         pFirst->Previous = this;
00059                         Next = pFirst;
00060                         Previous = NULL;
00061 
00062                         return this;
00063                 }
00064 
00065         virtual LinkClass* GetFirst()   //finds the first node in the list
00066                 {
00067                         LinkClass* p = this;
00068 
00069                         while(p->Previous) {
00070                                 p = p->Previous;
00071 
00072                                 if(p == this) {
00073                                         return this;
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                         return p;
00077                 }
00078 
00079         virtual LinkClass* GetLast()    //finds the last node in the list
00080                 {
00081                         LinkClass* p = this;
00082 
00083                         while(p->Next) {
00084                                 p = p->Next;
00085 
00086                                 if(p == this) {
00087                                         return this;
00088                                 }
00089                         }
00090                         return p;
00091                 }
00092 
00093         virtual void Isolate()  //removes this from the list
00094                 {
00095                         Next = NULL;
00096                         Previous = NULL;
00097                 }
00098 
00099         virtual LinkClass* IsolateFromList()    //removes this from the list
00100                                                                                         //returns first node if possible
00101                 {
00102                         LinkClass* pFirst = GetFirst();
00103                         LinkClass* pLast = GetLast();
00104 
00105                         if(Next)
00106                                 Next->Previous = Previous;
00107                                 
00108                         if(Previous)
00109                                 Previous->Next = Next;
00110                                 
00111                         Previous = NULL;
00112                         Next = NULL;
00113 
00114                         if(pFirst != this) {
00115                                 return pFirst;
00116                         } else if(pLast != this) {
00117                                 return pLast->GetFirst();
00118                         } else {
00119                                 return NULL;
00120                         }
00121                 }
00122 
00123         //Properties
00124         PROPERTY(LinkClass*,    Next);
00125         PROPERTY(LinkClass*,    Previous);
00126 };
00127 
00128 #endif
